sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT bfmv.source_id, bfmv.project_id, bfmv.chromosome_order_num, nvl(dsa.display_name, DECODE(bfmv.dataset, &&dataset_display_names&&, bfmv.dataset)) as dataset, bfmv.dataset as dataset_internal, bfmv.seq_source_id, bfmv.location, CASE WHEN bfmv.reference_strain = 'iowa_II' THEN 'IOWA II' WHEN bfmv.reference_strain = 'md' THEN 'MD' WHEN bfmv.reference_strain = 'tu114' THEN 'TU114' ELSE bfmv.reference_strain END as reference_strain, bfmv.reference_na, decode(bfmv.is_coding, 1, 'coding', 'non-coding') is_coding, bfmv.position_in_CDS, bfmv.position_in_protein, bfmv.reference_aa, case when is_coding = 0 then null else decode(has_nonsynonymous_allele, 1, 'Has Non-Synonymous', 'Synonymous') end has_nonsynonymous_allele, bfmv.gene_source_id, bfmv.gene_strand, bfmv.lflank, bfmv.lflank||''||bfmv.reference_na||''||bfmv.rflank as snp_context, bfmv.rflank, bfmv.reference_na as allele, bfmv.organism as organism_text, bfmv.ncbi_tax_id, '' || SUBSTR(bfmv.organism, 1, 1) || '.' || REGEXP_REPLACE(SUBSTR(bfmv.organism, INSTR(bfmv.organism, ' ')), '[[:space:]]+', chr(38) || 'nbsp;') || '' AS formatted_organism, bfmv.minor_allele_frequency, bfmv.major_allele_frequency, bfmv.distinct_strain_count,bfmv.minor_product, bfmv.major_product,bfmv.major_allele,bfmv.minor_allele, trim(to_char(bfmv.location,'99,999,999')) as location_text, CASE WHEN bfmv.gene_strand = 'reverse' and bfmv.rflank is not null THEN apidb.reverse_complement(bfmv.rflank) ELSE null END as lflank_gene_strand, CASE WHEN bfmv.gene_strand = 'reverse' and bfmv.lflank is not null THEN apidb.reverse_complement(bfmv.lflank) ELSE null END as rflank_gene_strand, CASE WHEN bfmv.gene_strand = 'reverse' THEN apidb.reverse_complement(bfmv.reference_na) ELSE null END as allele_gene_strand, CASE WHEN bfmv.gene_strand = 'reverse' THEN apidb.reverse_complement(bfmv.rflank)||''||apidb.reverse_complement(bfmv.reference_na) ||''||apidb.reverse_complement(bfmv.lflank) ELSE null END as snp_context_gene_strand FROM ApidbTuning.SnpAttributes bfmv, apidbtuning.DatasetPresenter dsa WHERE bfmv.dataset = dsa.name (+)

sqlQuery.name: Sequence
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT snp.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, SUBSTR(nas.sequence,snp.location - 60,60) as lflank, SUBSTR(nas.sequence,snp.location,1) as allele, SUBSTR(nas.sequence,snp.location + 1,60) as rflank FROM dots.nasequence nas, apidb.SNP snp WHERE snp.na_sequence_id = nas.na_sequence_id
